description.illuminations.autoUpdater1: Illuminations 擁有自動更新功能讓你保持最新版本
description.illuminations.autoUpdater2: 您無須擔心任何事情，Illuminations 將永遠保持最新版本。
description.illuminations.autoUpdater3: 此功能預設停用，但你可以在此將其啟用。
description.illuminations.autoUpdater4: 請考慮啟用以幫助開發者
description.illuminations.autoUpdater5: 也讓你隨時保持最新版本。
description.illuminations.autoUpdater6: 此畫面只會出現一次，不會再打擾您。
description.illuminations.autoUpdater7: 若您在這之後希望停用或關閉這項功能，
description.illuminations.autoUpdater8: 您可以變更 Illuminations 之設定。
category.illuminations.other.description: Settings for all other biomes not defined in other settings
option.tooltip.illuminations.halloweenFe: Halloween features like spooky glowing eyes, pumpkin spirits and poltergeists.
ENABLE: Halloween features will appear during October
DISABLE: Halloween features will never appear
ALWAYS: Halloween features will appear no matter the date
option.illuminations.eyesInTheDarkSpawnR: Eyes in the Dark Spawn Rate
option.tooltip.illuminations.eyesInTheDa: The spawn rate of eyes in the dark.
LOW: Eyes will appear in low quantities
MEDIUM: Eyes will appear in medium quantities
HIGH: Eyes will appear in high quantities
option.tooltip.illuminations.willOWispsS: The spawn rate of will o' wisps.
DISABLE: Will O' Wisps don't appear
LOW: Will O' Wisps appear in low quantities
MEDIUM: Will O' Wisps appear in medium quantities
HIGH: Will O' Wisps appear in high quantities
option.tooltip.illuminations.chorusPetal: The spawn rate multiplier of chorus petals.
10x: Multiplies the amount of chorus petals appearing by 10
option.tooltip.illuminations.density: 在等體積下的生成率（百分比）。不影響暗處的眼睛。
option.tooltip.illuminations.fireflySpaw: Fireflies spawn every time of day.
option.tooltip.illuminations.autoUpdate: 自動下載及安裝新版本。
option.tooltip.illuminations.fireflyWhit: 螢火蟲中心的透明度（百分比）。
option.illuminations.viewAurasFP: 在第一人稱視角時顯示裝飾品
option.tooltip.illuminations.viewAurasFP: Whether your own auras and pets should render while in first person.
option.tooltip.illuminations.fireflySpaw: LOW: Fireflies appear in low quantities
MEDIUM: Fireflies appear in medium quantities
HIGH: Fireflies appear in high quantities
option.tooltip.illuminations.glowwormSpa: LOW: Glowworms appear in low quantities
MEDIUM: Glowworms appear in medium quantities
HIGH: Glowworms appear in high quantities
option.tooltip.illuminations.planktonSpa: LOW: Plankton appears in low quantities
MEDIUM: Plankton appears in medium quantities
HIGH: Plankton appears in high quantities
option.tooltip.illuminations.displayDona: If you already donated or don't want to donate, set this option to false.
option.tooltip.illuminations.debugMode: Enable debug mode logs to troubleshoot issues with cosmetics loading.
